name: Another Business
description:
Clicker game made for the Clicker Jam Spring 2023.

You are businessman and the goal is to make the most money. You have shops that produce products and a warehouse where products are stored. Products are then sold for money, which can be used to purchase upgrades and other things

All attributes to the assets can be found in the credit section of the game.

Note - The game is still in a very early stage, it might still have a few bugs.

 A heads up before starting, The game doesn't have a tutorial ( Will be released in a future update ), But when starting out your business has no product selected. You will have to select one before clicks work by going on to hamburger at top -> shop info
